headline: Solventum Announces Launch of Secondary Offering of Common Stock
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE: SOLV, "Company" or "Solventum") today announced the launch of a secondary offering (the "Offering") of 8,800,000 shares of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share, by 3M Company (the "Selling Shareholder"). All of the shares of common stock are being sold by the Selling Shareholder, and Solventum will not receive any proceeds from the Offering.

All of the shares of common stock are being sold by the Selling Shareholder, and Solventum will not receive any proceeds from the Offering.

headline: 3M Company Rises 22.3% YTD: Should You Buy the Stock Now or Wait?
summary: MMM stock is up 22.3% YTD, driven by strong segment growth and cost actions, but high debt and valuation weigh on near-term upside.

headline: Dividend Cut Alert: High-Yield Dividend Growth Stocks Getting Risky
summary: Dividend growth stocks are often viewed as some of the safest income investments. See here for an analysis of high-yield dividend growth stocks with payout risks.
